Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: pantagruelParis
Reviews.Content: I have never met a Turkish hotel where the reception was anything but warm and friendly and this well-situated small establishment is no exception. The rooms are small, which is usually the case in hotels in Sultanahmet which are converted pirvate houses. Free wifi, good breakfast on an enclosed rooftop terrace. Rather cheaper than some of the competition.

Reviews.Title: “They painted the room while we were out”
Reviews.Author: mellifluous2010
Reviews.Content: We came home three times and found our window wide open. There was even paint on the bed and on the door handle of the room! The worst part was how the manager and the owner treated me when I raised the issue. The manager's defence was "don't you trust us" and "well what else could we do?". My job was to answer these questions although I really didn't get a word in edgeways with him. The owner's response was even better. He said, " you should say thank you to us" and "but you weren't in the room while we did it were you!" and finally weighed in with "I'm the owner I can do what I like". So if you want your room renovated (badly) while you stay you know where to go. It's a no more than average hotel but unfortunately because I went during Easter I paid almost Â£100 a night. If I'd paid half that obviously I wouldn't have mined so much but if you pay that sort of money you expect slightly more. I'd also like to say that most of the staff worked really hard to make our stay pleasant, especially the sweet young boy at breakfast. If you're reading this patronising manager and fat owner, you should be ashamed of undoing all the good work of your staff/family.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and helpful staff, great location, great breakfast, good value”
Reviews.Author: joy_s7
Reviews.Content: Hotel Aslan is a small, budget, low-rise hotel (with a lift that works!) within walking distance of all the Sultanahmet region has to offer. A highlight was the ever efficient and helpful manager with a sense of humour who made every departure and homecoming a pleasant experience and was a constant source of good sightseeing advice. Breakfast overlooking the Bosphorous and the Blue Mosque was always a pleasant experience. The hotel was clean, everything seemed to work well (including the wireless internet) and the hotel was well organised. The only downside was the rooms were on the small side and most of the restaurants nearby were (not surprisingly given the location) aimed at tourists. I have no hesitation recommending Hotel Aslan. I thought it was very good value (it pays to book ahead and get cheaper rates) and have already recommended it to friends who are intending to visit Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect budget hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: JuRo
Reviews.Content: This is a small hotel in an excellent situation at the quieter end of the main bar/restaurant strip in Sultanhamet. We booked 4 nights (60 euros a night) and they included a free transfer from the airport which was great. Unfortunately the room we were allocated was awful; a tiny room on the ground floor at the back with no window. We spent the first night here but the next day they moved us to the first floor at the front. Still a small room but at least with a window over the street. The higher floors are the suites and much more expensive. Breakfast was good and served on the terrace (very hot!) with a view of the sea. The staff are incredibly helpful and friendly. Free internet on computers in the lobby along with free tea and coffee.

Reviews.Title: “a very TurkÄ±sh and frÄ±endly hotel”
Reviews.Author: Iona-On-tour
Reviews.Content: If you are lookÄ±ng for a well prÄ±ced central hotel then here you have Ä±t. The cheaper rooms have everythÄ±ng you need but are very basÄ±c. The best rooms whÄ±ch Ä± have also stayed Ä±n, room 404 beÄ±ng the most elaborate, houses an Ä±ncredÄ±ble bathroom and lavÄ±sh beds. The decore Ä±s tacky wÄ±th large amounts of velvet and tassels, but Ä± found that fun and alternatÄ±ve. The people at receptÄ±on are very helpful and entertaÄ±nÄ±ng. Breakfast Ä±s very European and has a good selectÄ±on to sevre evreryone's breakfast needs. Breakfast Ä±s served on a roof top partly covered overlookÄ±ng the sea. In the wonderous room 404 not only does Ä±t have a balcony bÄ±g enough for two tables and chaÄ±rs, the bathroom has a multÄ±functÄ±onal shower unÄ±t. It Ä±s very entertaÄ±nÄ±ng as the shower/bath/steam room/water shooter also creates bubbles makÄ±ng a hot tub. I reccomend the Aslan hotel Ä±f you,re vÄ±sÄ±tÄ±ng Istanbul for a short trÄ±p, an all round good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Small and charming Hotel with great location”
Reviews.Author: niniebuch
Reviews.Content: Hi, I stayed with a friend in this hotel for a short citytrip to Istanbul. The hotel is small and charming. We had a big room with a verry clean bathroom. Breakfast is great and you have a wonferfull view from the roofterras. Nice locations in Istanbul, you are near the bleu mosk en restaurants...friendly service and free wifi!

Reviews.Title: “Just 1 word : EXCELLENT!!”
Reviews.Author: MeMelo
Reviews.Content: Excellent service! AMAZING Staff! Lovely view everywhere! From the moment we arrived we were welcomed with an very friendly smile. The manager Beddi and other staff members Mert, Mevlut etc made us feel very good. They helped us with almost everything ! The beds are really very comfortable! The hotel is located next to the Blue Mosque and other attractions are within walking distance! Everything is TOP TOP TOP !!!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: MEKARU
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very nice! The staff , the breakfast everything was good! I loved the vieuw ! The beds were perfect! Nothing bad to say about this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Super service, superb!”
Reviews.Author: Timewarp48
Reviews.Content: Realy the best staff ever, very very friendly. The location is A+, next to the bleu mosk. Close to many many restaurants and pubs. The roof terras has a great view over the Bosporus. Better exchange rates than the bank!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel & Staff”
Reviews.Author: Ayse_Hur
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great value for money; the rooms are clean and comfortable, the breakfast was delicious and the views from the roof terrace are breathtaking. Aside from this one of the most fantastic things about this hotel is the staff. My husband and I were treated very well; they were very welcoming and always friendly - nothing was too much trouble for them. Especially the receptonist 'Emrah' who pointed us in the right direction for the best places to go and the best prices. They were also amazing with our 7 month old son, always making a fuss and giving him attention. It is in a great location; with most of Sultanahmets main attractions on your doorstep. This hotel made our trip to Istanbul a pure delight. I would certainly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: lauracee
Reviews.Content: Ä± really enjoyed my stay here at Hotel Aslan Ä±n Istanbul. they hotel staff well very very frÄ±endly and welcomÄ±ng, Ä±f you need help or dÄ±rectÄ±ons they wÄ±ll help you wÄ±th no trouble and always happy especÄ±ally Emrah! and the rooms were of a very hÄ±gh standard. Ä± would recommend thÄ±s hotel to any one travellÄ±ng to Istanbul. Very very nÄ±ce. Ä± partÄ±cularly lÄ±ke the terrace where you could look rÄ±ght over Ä±stanbul. very nÄ±ce vÄ±ews. Ä± would defÄ±nÄ±tely come back and vÄ±sÄ±t Hotel Aslan .

Reviews.Title: “Perfect service,great people and serious work”
Reviews.Author: karachof
Reviews.Content: When I was stayed in Aslan Hotel,I had very good feelings for everything.I can say that I had wonderful time and whenever I will fly to istanbul I will stay always in Aslan Hotel.Thanky you for your perfect interest.I will say all my friends about Aslan Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “perfect, excellent,nothing bad to say”
Reviews.Author: abelardo50
Reviews.Content: l do not know how to explain the greeting we had at the aslan hotel. we had stayed at many hotels before aslan hotel but hadnâ€™t found the warm atmosphere any where it s a quiet small hotel in sultanahmet which is close to the blue mosque and Sofia museum topkap palace and all other historic places that you would want to see while you are in istanbul like big grand bazaar and the Egyptian bazaar. its an excellent point for transportation if you havenâ€™t rented a car. you can hang around and go anywhere with the tram transportation system or take the buses any where you want. beware of taxi drivers they are a little tricky sometimes. the breakfast was excellent they offered many kind of food. the staff was excellent very warm very friendly and over all reliable. l want to say thank you to all of aslan hotels staff especially mr.Emrah for his help and friendliness. l recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “very good service, clean rooms and good location, 2 mins fron blue mosque”
Reviews.Author: sagir
Reviews.Content: i stayed here with my sons for five nights, the staff were very friendly and helpful. stayed in the deluxe room which had a double bed and two single beds, was offered an additional bed and still and ample room to move around. The blue mosque was only a couple minutes away. Had air con, nice bath room, quite at night and rooms very cleaned daily. Had free access to lap tops for email and internet use.

Reviews.Title: “great place at goldernhorn”
Reviews.Author: frankkBerlin
Reviews.Content: Ä± stayed with my wife fot honeymoon .. september 21th - september 26 we did make reservation to sultan suit room , when we use the room we can understant everything specially .. on the room have a big balcony jacuzzi and wonderfull decoration . when Ä± tÃ¼rn my head Ä± see one more suprise.. hotel staff helfll and frendly . we did make breakfast on tha our balkony other for day we make terrace.. wnderfull view realy.. 5 minute inside you can go to blue mosgue ,sn sophia, topkapi place ,hippodrom . you can go to by walk .. location perfect everything perfect for we . Ä± want came back istanbul our future time and we will stay aslan hotel THANKS FOR ALL...

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFULL”
Reviews.Author: DIRK39
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed at the aslan hotel . We enjoy staying at the aslan hotel maneger mr.bedi was very helpful, along with the other staff. I look forward to staying again at their hotel. Ä± hop Ä± can see all aslan hotel staff my future time..thanks alot to aslan hotel family..

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: noname44
Reviews.Content: Hotel Aslan looks nice enough from the outside, but the rooms are tiny, uncomfortable, cheap amenities, cheaply furnished. No chair, no table, no place for the suitcases. The bathroom in our room was disgusting, moldy, broken shower door, resulting in flooding of the bathroom floor. Poor value for the cost. There are many better choices in Istanbul. Breakfast was fine. Would not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special”
Reviews.Author: CaptainRadar
Reviews.Content: Hotel Aslan is friendly and clean. Not inexpensive, tiny room, poor Wifi coverage. I think there's probably better for the price.

Reviews.Title: “a clean Gem Ä±n the heart of the old town”
Reviews.Author: tvdude
Reviews.Content: UnbelÄ±eveable for a 3 star hotel. perfectly clean. NÄ±ce room (401) wÄ±th a partÄ±al vÄ±ew of the blue Mosque. The staff were extremely frÄ±endly and very attentÄ±ve. There Ä±s a roof terrace but Ä±t was closed due to the cold. the breakfast was varÄ±ed and Ä±ncluded your choÄ±ce of Ä±ndÄ±vÄ±dually prepared eggs.....I found that partÄ±cularly rare for a 3 star hotel. They allowed us to leave our bags and even provÄ±ded us wÄ±th tea at no charge. For a great deal, only 50 euros (49.50 for two persons) thÄ±s Ä±s an Ä±deal hotel for the budget traveller who prefers 5 star servÄ±ce....

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: yinic
Reviews.Content: Its a great place to stay and service is excellent. We arrive at around 12noon to the hotel. Of course the breakfast was over, but the manager asked if we had anything to eat yet and we said no since we just arrived to the hotel straight from the airport. He brought out breakfast for the two of us and told us to relax before we got out later for a meal. No sure if we can get that kind of service in a five stars hotel !!
